subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining common configuration properties for all UI components.

subMembers.name: accessKey
subMembers.description: Specifies the shortcut key that sets focus on the UI component.

subMembers.name: activeStateEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component changes its visual state as a result of user interaction.

subMembers.name: disabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component responds to user interaction.

subMembers.name: focusStateEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component can be focused using keyboard navigation.

subMembers.name: hint
subMembers.description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the UI component.

subMembers.name: hoverStateEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component changes its state when a user pauses on it.

subMembers.name: tabIndex
subMembers.description: Specifies the number of the element when the Tab key is used for navigating.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component is visible.

properties.name: Widget
properties.description: The base class for UI components.

Methods.name: focus()
Methods.description: Sets focus on the UI component.

Methods.name: registerKeyHandler(key_handler)
Methods.description: Registers a handler to be executed when a user presses a specific key.

Methods.name: repaint()
Methods.description: Renders the component again without reloading data. Use the method to update the component's markup and appearance dynamically.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: contentReady
Events.description: Raised when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.
